summary: The client approved the execution of sprint SP-001, and the sprint planning architect announced the start of sprint execution, with the AI team beginning work on the associated user stories.

decisions.title: Execute Sprint SP-001
decisions.details: Client confirmed execution, initiating code generation for US-001, US-010, and US-015

actions.task: Begin working on stories US-001, US-010, and US-015

backlog_deltas.title: Sprint status changed to execution started
